titulo: The 2-Minute Rule: Order in Digital Chaos
resumen: If it takes less than 2 minutes to organize that file or answer that email, do it now. How to apply this Stoic principle to your digital life.

titulo: Why Does Paper Make Us Smarter?
resumen: Handwriting activates brain areas that typing ignores. Why you should always have an analog notebook next to your laptop.

titulo: White Noise vs. Silence: What's Better?
resumen: We analyze if it's better to work in absolute silence (with earplugs) or with ambient sound. The answer depends on your brain type.
Having 50 icons on the desktop generates visual cortisol. Quick guide to having a work environment that gives you peace of mind.
Do you freeze when choosing between two almost identical products? I teach you psychological tricks to make purchase decisions faster.

titulo: Cheap Dopamine: Why You Can't Quit Your Phone
resumen: Notifications are designed to hijack your attention. Physical tools to regain control of your time.
